overview: Jay McKnight is a financial executive with experience in business to business and business to consumer healthcare companies. He served as Vice President and Corporate Controller of CHD Meridian Healthcare (AMEX: DMX), which was successfully sold to Walgreen Co. to form Take Care Health Employer Solutions. Take Care operated in excess of 30 employer sponsored pharmacies and over 300 health clinics. Jay served as Director of Financial Reporting and Quality Assurance at American HomePatient, Inc. (OTC: AHOM.OB) and as an Audit Manager with Ernst & Young LLP and Arthur Andersen LLP. Jay is a CPA licensed in multiple states.
